text: Hi. Beginner here. Is there a one-liner to convert in place a DataFrame column that has yyyymmdd (e.g. 19991231) as Int64 to Date type? Thank you.

elements.text: Hi. Beginner here. Is there a one-liner to convert in place a DataFrame column that has yyyymmdd (e.g. 19991231) as Int64 to Date type? Thank you.

text: check out the Dates package. You need to specify the correct DateFormat though

elements.text: check out the Dates package. You need to specify the correct DateFormat though

text: I think you need a string, i.e. `Date(string(19991231), dateformat"yyyymmdd")`

elements.text: I think you need a string, i.e.
